content: **knitted hat for children in drops air the piece is worked bottom up with stocking stitch and a brim sizes 2 - 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-051-bn yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 -10/12 years fits head-size 48/50 - 50/52 - 52/54 - 54/56 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-100-100 g colour 39 magenta **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
